name: homid

body.origin:
|- wceq(chom, cslot(cfv(chom, cnx)))
-| wceq(chom, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat4)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ Hom = Slot((Hom ` ndx))
⊣ Hom = Slot(cdc(1, 4))
⊣ cdc(1, 4)∈ ℕ

|- wceq(chom, cslot(cfv(chom, cnx)))
-| wceq(chom, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat4)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Hom = Slot((Hom ` ndx))
⊣ Hom = Slot(cdc(1, 4))
⊣ cdc(1, 4)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(chom, cslot(cfv(chom, cnx)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)

-| wcel(nat4, cn)
